parameters.subject: Daily Content Moderation Report - {{$now.format('YYYY-MM-DD')}}

nodes.purpose: Send a message to an AI model and get response

configuration.notes: AI content moderation - analyzes social media posts for inappropriate material and flags suspicious content

values.content: You are a content moderation AI. Analyze social media posts for inappropriate content including hate speech, harassment, spam, adult content, violence, and misinformation. Respond with a JSON object containing: {"flagged": boolean, "confidence": number (0-1), "categories": [array of violation types], "severity": "low"|"medium"|"high", "summary": "brief explanation"}

nodes.purpose: Transform data structure using JavaScript

configuration.notes: Transform AI analysis results and social media post data into structured format for database storage and reporting

nodes.purpose: Trigger daily digest email generation on a scheduled basis

configuration.notes: Triggers daily digest email generation for content moderation reports

nodes.purpose: Route flagged content based on AI analysis results for conditional processing

configuration.notes: Routes content based on AI analysis results - flagged content goes to true branch, clean content to false branch
